dataGroup.title: Personal Introduction
description: 1. Experienced in developing web applications using React, Vue, and Angular.
2. Proficient in using UI libraries such as Bootstrap and Material-UI.
3. Familiar with frontend libraries like Axios for handling HTTP requests.
4. Have a good understanding of frontend routing and state management.
5. Basic backend development skills, with experience in Node.js and Express.js.
6. Familiar with common data structures and algorithms.

data.title: Stanford University
description: Main Courses: Data Structures, Algorithms, Web Development, Database Systems
Achievements: Dean's List, Passed TOEFL and GRE

data.title: E-commerce Website
description: Project Description: An e-commerce website with features like product listing, shopping cart, and user authentication.
Main Work: Implemented the frontend part of the website, including the product listing page, shopping cart, and user authentication.

data.title: Social Media App
description: Project Description: A social media app with features like post creation, likes, comments, and user profiles.
Main Work: Implemented both frontend and backend of the app, including post creation, likes, comments, and user profiles.

data.title: Task Management App
description: Project Description: A task management app with features like task creation, task assignment, and task status tracking.
Main Work: Implemented the backend part of the app, including task creation, task assignment, and task status tracking.

data.title: XYZ Tech Company
data.description: Developed and maintained several web applications using React and Vue. Also responsible for some backend work using Node.js and Express.js.
